channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 07:45 Alarm response in Zhytomyr region. Stay tuned for further messages.
item.description: 🟢 07:45 Alarm response in Zhytomyr region. Stay tuned for further messages. #Zhytomyr_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.

item.title: 🟢 07:36 Threat of artillery shelling in Pokrovska territorial community repulsed. Stay tuned for further reports.
item.description: 🟢 07:36 Threat of artillery shelling in Pokrovska territorial community repulsed.
